title: fod2fixel
description:
Perform segmentation of continuous Fibre Orientation Distributions (FODs) to produce discrete fixels.



References:

* Reference for the FOD segmentation method:
Smith, R. E.; Tournier, J.-D.; Calamante, F. & Connelly, A. SIFT: Spherical-deconvolution informed filtering of tractograms. NeuroImage, 2013, 67, 298-312 (Appendix 2)

* Reference for Apparent Fibre Density (AFD):
Raffelt, D.; Tournier, J.-D.; Rose, S.; Ridgway, G.R.; Henderson, R.; Crozier, S.; Salvado, O.; Connelly, A. Apparent Fibre Density: a novel measure for the analysis of diffusion-weighted magnetic resonance images.Neuroimage, 2012, 15;59(4), 3976-94

afd.title: afd
afd.description: output the total Apparent Fibre Density per fixel (integral of FOD lobe)

peak_amp.title: peak_amp
peak_amp.description: output the amplitude of the FOD at the maximal peak per fixel

disp.title: disp
disp.description: output a measure of dispersion per fixel as the ratio between FOD lobe integral and maximal peak amplitude

fmls_integral.title: fmls_integral
fmls_integral.description: threshold absolute numerical integral of positive FOD lobes. Any lobe for which the integral is smaller than this threshold will be discarded. Default: 0.

fmls_peak_value.title: fmls_peak_value
fmls_peak_value.description: threshold peak amplitude of positive FOD lobes. Any lobe for which the maximal peak amplitude is smaller than this threshold will be discarded. Default: 0.1.

fmls_no_thresholds.title: fmls_no_thresholds
fmls_no_thresholds.description: disable all FOD lobe thresholding; every lobe where the FOD is positive will be retained.

fmls_lobe_merge_ratio.title: fmls_lobe_merge_ratio
fmls_lobe_merge_ratio.description: Specify the ratio between a given FOD amplitude sample between two lobes, and the smallest peak amplitude of the adjacent lobes, above which those lobes will be merged. This is the amplitude of the FOD at the 'bridge' point between the two lobes, divided by the peak amplitude of the smaller of the two adjoining lobes. A value of 1.0 will never merge two lobes into one; a value of 0.0 will always merge lobes unless they are bisected by a zero-valued crossing. Default: 1.

mask.title: mask
mask.description: only perform computation within the specified binary brain mask image.

maxnum.title: maxnum
maxnum.description: maximum number of fixels to output for any particular voxel (default: no limit)

nii.title: nii
nii.description: output the directions and index file in nii format (instead of the default mif)

dirpeak.title: dirpeak
dirpeak.description: define the fixel direction as that of the lobe's maximal peak as opposed to its weighted mean direction (the default)

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.title: value
value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

items.title: config
items.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

config.title: config
config.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

help.title: help
help.description: display this information page and exit.
